titles.title: A bill to provide for a separate tariff classification for opal borosilicate glassware and to suspend temporarily the duty on glassware of that kind.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Executive Comment Requested from State, Treasury, Commerce, Labor, ITC, USTR.
Unfavorable Executive Comment Received From Commerce.

bill.summary: 2/24/1988--Introduced. Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide a separate tariff classification for opal borosilicate glassware used chiefly for preparing, serving, or storing food or beverages. Suspends the duty on such glassware through December 31, 1992.
